abstract.p: This paper describes a statistical model of the firm's daily disbursements that follows the logic of the payments pattern approach to cash forecasting. The model provides reasonable forecasts of daily disbursements that may allow managers to significantly reduce idle balances. It is useful primarily for companies that cannot avail themselves of "controlled disbursing" or "managing about a target" methods.
